text: Familial hemiplegic migraine is a rare type of migraine headache with aura. It is an inherited medical disorder that causes paralysis on one side of the body.E. Steve Roach: Pediatric Stroke and Cerebrovascular Disorders. Demos Medical; 3 Ed., 2011, p. 159 ==References== Category:Migraine
title: Familial hemiplegic migraine
